item.title: Topic Index
item.description: The following is a list of topics and skills covered during the semester. This will grow as we progress through the coursework. Italicized items are only covered in the readings. If you have additions or suggestions, please let Chris know! A-D American Community Survey (Lecture-08) Downlading, see tidycensus American Fact Finder (Lecture-08) Analysis development (Course Preview, Lectues 01, 02, and 04) Assignment operator, <- (Lecture-01) base, see “R, base“ Broken data connections, repairing (Lecture-04) Cartography Basic design principles (Lecture-01) Visual hirearchy (Lecture-04) Centroids (Lecture-09) Calcuating in ArcGIS Calculating in R, see sf Coordinate system EPSG codes (Lecture-10) Geographic coordinate systems (Lecture-10) and Datums and Ellipsoids NAD 1983 WGS 1984 Overview (Lecture-04) Projected coordinate systems (Lecture-10) Albers family of equal area projections Lambert family of conic projections State plane system UTM system Working with in ArcGIS (Lecture-10) Working with in R, see sf Census geography Downloading, see tigris (Lecture-08) Overview (Lecture-04) Coral, Lilian (Course Preview) Data and levels of measurement (Lecture-03) Data types (Lecture-03) Data wranglng and cleaning (Lecture-03) Open data (Course Preview, Lecture-01) stlData, see “stlData“ Data frames in ArcGIS (Lecture-04) Demography (Lecture-08) Descartes, Rene (Lecture-10) devtools, see “GitHub, Install packages from“ dplyr, see tidyverse E-H Folder connections (Lecture-04) Fonts, see “Typography“ Gauss, Carl Fredrich (Lecture-10) Geodatabases Overview (Lecture-04) Geographic coordinate system, see “Coordinate system“ ggplot2, see tidyverse Git (Lecture-02) GitHub Install packages from with devtools, install_github() (Lecture-01) Integration with Git workflow (Lecture-02) here - file path management Create file paths, here() (Lectures 02 and 03) I-L Inspecting features in ArcGIS (Lecture-04) Install packages in R From CRAN, see utils From GitHub, see devtools Interactive maps in R with leaflet (Lecture-01), see also “leaflet“ Los Angeles GeoHub (Course Preview) janitor - data cleaning (Lecture-03) Duplicate observation analysis, get_dupes() Rename variables en-mase, clean_names() Layers in ArcGIS (Lecture-04) Adding and removing Editing symbology Reordering leaflet, see also “Interactive maps” Adding map tiles, addTiles() (Lectures 01 and 10) Adding markers to map, addMarkers() (Lectures 01 and 10) Adding tiles from other providers, addProviderTiles() (Lecture-01) Creating map widget, leaflet() (Lectures 01 and 10) Literate programming (Lecture-02) M-P magrittr, see “Pipe operator, %>%“ Markdown (Lecture-02) In R, see “Markdown“ naniar - missing data (Lecture-03) Missing data analysis by observation, miss_case_summary() Missing data analysis by variable, miss_var_summary() Navigating map documents (Lecture-04) Normalization (Lecture-03) Open data, see “Data“ Packages, see “R, Packages“ Parker, Hilary (Course Preview) Pipe operator, %>% (Lectures 01 and 03) Projected coordinate system, see “Coordinate system“ Public saftey Cyclist saftey (Course Preview) Pedestrian saftey (Course Preview) Q-T R base if-else statements, ifelse() (Lecture-03) get class, class() (Lecture-09) test if vector is character, is.
